column4: is there a way to install GDM login window themes in 10.04 and later, so that you can have a customized login window, rather than the standard background, one-panel, white-login-box login window?
i know such a feature existed pre-9.10, is such a feature able to be put into 10.04 or later?
you can change the wallpaper for gdm2 -  and a few other tweaks.
but ive not seen many gdm2 full 'themes'
